meta.description: Determine the number of bananas and mangoes a gorilla should consume to minimize sugar intake while meeting nutritional requirements.

sets.name: FRUITS
sets.description: Types of fruits available for feeding the gorilla.

params.name: potassium
params.description: Potassium content per fruit type in grams.

params.name: sugar
params.description: Sugar content per fruit type in grams.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of fruit to feed the gorilla.

objective.name: min_sugar_intake
objective.description: Minimize the total sugar intake from the fruits.

constraints.name: calories_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure the gorilla consumes at least 4000 calories.

constraints.name: potassium_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure the gorilla consumes at least 150 grams of potassium.

constraints.name: mango_preference_limit
constraints.description: At most 33% of the fruits consumed can be mangoes.
